choose.when: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.INDATE ASC) RNUM, R.R_IDX, R.B_IDX, R.G_IDX, R.U_ID, R.CONT, TO_CHAR(R.INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS INDATE, U.IMG, R.C_IDX, R.D_CK FROM REPLY R INNER JOIN USERS U on R.U_ID = U.U_ID WHERE R.B_IDX = ${b_idx} ORDER BY R.INDATE ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${pageNum} AND ${contentNum}
choose.otherwise: SELECT R.R_IDX, R.B_IDX, R.G_IDX, R.U_ID, R.CONT, TO_CHAR(R.INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS INDATE, U.IMG, R.C_IDX, R.D_CK FROM REPLY R INNER JOIN USERS U on R.U_ID = U.U_ID WHERE R.C_IDX = ${c_idx} ORDER BY INDATE ASC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(R_IDX ,CONT, B_IDX, U_ID, G_IDX) VALUES(( SELECT NVL(MAX(R_IDX),0)+1 FROM REPLY ),#{cont}, ${b_idx}, #{u_id}, ${g_idx})
INSERT INTO REPLY(R_IDX ,CONT, B_IDX, U_ID, G_IDX, C_IDX) VALUES(( SELECT NVL(MAX(R_IDX),0)+1 FROM REPLY ),#{cont}, ${b_idx}, #{u_id}, ${g_idx}, ${c_idx})
